Data: 7.30 pm Pakistan win the toss again and will have a bowl
Abdul Razzaq to Warner, no run gentle length ball from over the stumps, patted away
Abdul Razzaq to Warner, no run moves away across the left-hander from a length, worked back to the bowler

Abdul Razzaq to Warner, FOUR runs a thick edge first ball, Razzaq has his hands on his head, making Warner drive with a pitched up ball that moved away enough to take the edge, race past the lone slip and beat third man's dive

Abdul Razzaq to Warner, no run a leg-before appeal now, big one from the bowler, hit right in front of middle stump, on the knee roll, on the hop as he missed the work to leg, but that pitched clearly outside the leg stump
Abdul Razzaq to Warner, no run solid start this from Razzaq, not much pace, but he's moved it around, kept it tight, this one is pitched up on the stumps, and is worked to leg
Abdul Razzaq to Warner, 2 runs too much leg side and works it in front of square leg
Umar Gul to Watson, no run zip and away swing first ball, widish delivery swerving away from a good length, Watson goes after it, cannot connect

Umar Gul to Watson, no run this time he has him flailing outside the line, this ball has done the opposite, it has started slightly across outside off, and then nipped in after pitching on a length, beats the inside edge
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run into the pads now from short of a length, worked behind square
Umar Gul to Warner, 1 run fullish into the pads, and whipped in the air, deep square leg in place few metres in from the rope
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run goes across, opens up to softly defend a short of a length ball on leg and takes one
Umar Gul to Warner, 1 run Gul working up some pace, fullish into the stumps, Warner leans across to work to mid on, and beats the direct hit to the other end
Abdul Razzaq to Warner, 1 run that kicked a bit from a good length, Warner checks his push from the crease, single is on to extra cover

Abdul Razzaq to Watson, no run that looked a very good shout, full and catching him on the pads as Watson missed the flick, pitched around off, hit him in front of leg stump as it nipped in, some doubt with the angle
Abdul Razzaq to Watson, FOUR runs smack! Watson breaks free in typical fashion, gets forward to a pitched up ball, reaches with the swing and deposits it cleanly straight down the ground
Abdul Razzaq to Watson, no run was lining up the swing again, this one held its line from a good length, and he defended solidly to off
Abdul Razzaq to Watson, no run tries to smash it down the ground again, wider line this time, mistimed off the inner part of the blade
Abdul Razzaq to Watson, 1 run opens the bat late and runs a length ball down to third man
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run back of a length, cramping him as it moves in a bit, dropped towards point
Umar Gul to Warner, SIX runs Warner gets going now, shortish, he pulls off the front foot, from outside the crease, mows it over wide long on
Umar Gul to Warner, 1 run Gul replies with a skiddy sharp bouncer into Warner, who pulls his head away and hooks it behind square leg
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run tries the swat down the ground again, thick inside edge behind square leg
Umar Gul to Warner, 1 run pings him on the glove, good delivery, short of a length, getting big on Warner, who tries to weave out of the line, it holds its line and takes glove to roll behind point
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run Gul coming back superbly after that six, now he hurls in an inswinging yorker to Watson, who barely gets it away behind square leg
Arafat to Watson, 2 runs some width first ball, cut late past a diving point, and they charge back for two
Arafat to Watson, 2 runs more width, Watson slaps it to the left of mid off, Razzaq scrambles and manages to put in an awkward dive to take pace off the ball
Arafat to Watson, SIX runs carted over deep midwicket, used the angle into him on the back of a length ball, fetching it from middle and heaving it into the stands
Arafat to Watson, no run missed out this time, crashed a full delivery straight to mid on
Arafat to Watson, 1 leg bye slower one, down the pads, nudged behind square
Arafat to Warner, 3 runs pushed in the air, but right in the gap between cover and extra cover, lurches away from them before one of the slides near the rope to haul it back in
Ajmal to Warner, no run straightens off a length outside off, pushed to point
Ajmal to Warner, 1 run fired into middle and leg from round the stumps, worked in front of square
Ajmal to Watson, no run moves forward to work towards midwicket, the ball pops up to vacant forward short leg
Ajmal to Watson, no run tried to make room and bash him through the off side, cramped for room as it skidded in, forced to covers
Ajmal to Watson, no run backs away and opens the face to run it from middle, against the turn, wide of short third man
Ajmal to Watson, no run Watson shuffling about in the crease looking to pull, the ball spins in and goes between his legs
Raza Hasan to Warner, no run fired in flat to leg stump from over the wicket, rolls away
Raza Hasan to Warner, 2 runs angled in full to leg again, flicked behind square leg, the throw is very close to the stumps from Arafat, right into Kamran's gloves, direct hit was needed
Raza Hasan to Warner, 3 wide quick into the pads again, looked to have brushed the pad as he shouldered arms, they run as it is pulled back inside the fine leg rope, given wides
Raza Hasan to Warner, no run tries to slog-sweep over midwicket, cannot connect with the full delivery angled in
Raza Hasan to Warner, no run
Raza Hasan to Warner, 1 wide full, flat and fast down the leg side
Raza Hasan to Warner, 1 run some flight, Warner comes down the track, and swings it hard to long on
Raza Hasan to Watson, 1 run punched off the front foot to wide long off
Malik to Watson, SIX runs slog-swept first ball, tossed up on leg stump from round the wicket, Watson reaches out, and dismisses it high over deep midiwicket
Malik to Watson, 1 run lines up a big swing again, this one arrives quicker and fuller, hit down to long on
Malik to Warner, 1 run that has been steered to short fine leg, Warner moves around in the crease, becomes a right-hander, and runs the offbreak from outside his, now, off stump
Malik to Watson, SIX runs swatted, Malik pitches it shortish and flat now, some width too, Watson readies himself and bashes it flat over midwicket
Malik to Watson, no run full, swung back to the bowler, Malik threatens to throw it back at Watson
Malik to Watson, SIX runs oh dear, just got worse for Malik off the last ball, low full toss on the pads, Watson deposits it over deep midwicket once more, thank you very much
Raza Hasan to Warner, SIX runs they are coming from the other end now, Warner winds up and bursts into a slog sweep over deep square leg
Raza Hasan to Warner, no run beaten on the cut with a quick one outside off
Raza Hasan to Warner, no run worked to square leg
Raza Hasan to Warner, SIX runs he's created so much momentum with his movement down the track, not to the pitch of the ball, but his swing takes it way behind the boundary at wide long on
Raza Hasan to Warner, SIX runs faster they come, higher they go, full, Warner reaches out, picks it from way outside off, and launches it in front of square leg
Raza Hasan to Warner, 1 run length, worked to midwicket
Ajmal to Warner, SIX runs hello, Warner has switch-slog-swept Ajmal over deep midwicket, incredible, he is ready with the right-hander's stance, and carts it with just too much power
Ajmal to Warner, 1 run worked in front of square leg

Ajmal to Watson, SIX runs another six, shortish from Ajmal, Watson is not quite in position for the pull even as it skids on, but still manages to pack enough power on the swing to cart it over wide long on, first time a batsman has made 50 this series
Ajmal to Watson, no run tries to repeat the stroke, this one came on even quicker, and he ends up mishitting to off
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run absolutely crunched, absolutely crunched, down to long on
Ajmal to Warner, 1 run slower through the air, outside off, turned softly to leg

Arafat to Warner, SIX runs they are going after everything, flicked over wide long on for six now, walks down the pitch, again creates so much momentum that he does not need more than a flick to the length ball, and away it goes as it it has been clubbed
Arafat to Warner, 1 run shortish, swatted in front of square leg
Arafat to Watson, no run swinging in late, full, driven to extra cover
Arafat to Watson, OUT relief for Pakistan and release for the crowd, Watson surprised as this short ball nipped back at his throat, ended up hooking weakly and short fine leg took the top edge
Arafat to Maxwell, 1 run driven off the front foot to sweeper cover
Arafat to Warner, no run slow length ball around middle and leg, nudged towards midwicket, bowler cuts off the single
Hafeez to Maxwell, no run shuffles across and works from middle to midwicket
Hafeez to Maxwell, no run moves across again quite calmly, and runs it to short third man
Hafeez to Maxwell, no run comes down the pitch, pushes to midwicket
Hafeez to Maxwell, no run low loopy full toss, patted back to the bowler
Hafeez to Maxwell, no run cannot get it away again, moves across and pushes to extra cover
Hafeez to Maxwell, 2 runs down the track, beaten in the flight, but takes two off a thick outside edge behind point

Arafat to Warner, OUT Hafeez is settling under the steepler and he takes it at point, Warner swinging hard at a length ball going across, thick edge flies high, and even though there is a fielder very close to him, Hafeez takes it safely
Arafat to Maxwell, no run wobbly full one, outside off, swings and mistimes it down the pitch
Arafat to Maxwell, FOUR runs that has been scythed through extra cover, pitched up, width outside off, and he creams it off the front foot
Arafat to Maxwell, FOUR runs another one, Maxwell continuing the attack, heaves a length ball from off through midwicket
Arafat to Maxwell, no run yorker moves in full for the middle stump, jammed away to off, bowler fields
Arafat to Maxwell, 1 run low full toss swung away to deep square leg
Hafeez to Maxwell, 1 run
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run quick, worked to vacant midwicket
Hafeez to Maxwell, SIX runs he's given it everything, he really has, swivelled violently to the full ball and shovelled it high over deep square leg
Hafeez to Maxwell, 1 run drills a very full one to long on
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run worked to midwicket, man from the deep runs in
Hafeez to Maxwell, 1 run skips out, fetches it from wide outside off, does not get hold of it, dragged on the bounce to wide long on
Ajmal to Bailey, OUT bowled 'em, tried the slog sweep, missed, Ajmal found middle with some sharp turn from round the wicket
Ajmal to White, 1 leg bye offbreak hits the pads and rolls square on leg as White misses with the bat

Ajmal to Hussey, 4 byes missed stumping surely, beats the batsman with flight and lots of turn, pitched leg stump, puff of dust as it zips across, Kamran cannot collect, have to wait for replays, yes, Hussey's back leg was in the air
Ajmal to Hussey, no run
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run cut away to sweeper cover
Ajmal to White, no run patted back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run full ball angled widish across the left-hander, drives hard but not far enough from extra cover
Umar Gul to White, no run that moved in late and full, and he ended up pushing it straight back to the bowler
Umar Gul to White, OUT Australia losing their way towards the end, White now heaves a pitched up ball straight to long on
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run full and right on middle and leg, worked straight to midwicket
Umar Gul to Hussey, FOUR runs slower ball, Hussey latches on, pulls it from outside off stump, off the front foot, flat and over midwicket

Umar Gul to Hussey, 2 runs low full toss now on leg, worked through midwicket, the throw is at the bowler's end as they go for two, but Gul cannot collect the ball cleanly, would have been really tight otherwise
Raza Hasan to Maxwell, 2 runs straightens as he bowls slow on middle, worked through midwicket, the throw hits direct from the deep at the non-striker's, but Hussey has made it
Raza Hasan to Maxwell, FOUR runs thumps a reverse-switch hit past short third man now
Raza Hasan to Maxwell, no run tries to slog sweep, beaten by the slight turn and bounce outside off
Raza Hasan to Maxwell, OUT connects with the slog sweep now, but finds deep midwicket who runs in and manages to hold on
Raza Hasan to Hussey, 1 run quick on the stumps, worked past the bowler to long on
Raza Hasan to Bailey, no run driven to a tumbling Hafeez at extra cover
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run worked through midwicket, they are kept to one as Gul runs in from the deep
Hafeez to Bailey, 2 runs shuffles across and works it through square leg, they take the second this time, throw was wayward
Hafeez to Bailey, no run misses the sweep as he is struck on the pad
Hafeez to Bailey, no run going across on a length, slapped straight to extra cover
Hafeez to Bailey, 1 run whipped to deep midwicket
Hafeez to Hussey, no run misses the slog-sweep, inside edged into pad
Ajmal to Christian, 1 run sliding across wide from round the stumps, could have gone harder at that, guided through point

Ajmal to Hussey, no run some effort that from the captain at extra cover, it is a flat hit from Hussey, the ball is dying on Hafeez as he dives forward, he takes it on the bounce, and rips the throw to Kamran, who seems surprised as the ball arrives, and hits him, Hussey scrambles back
Ajmal to Hussey, OUT no, you can attack Ajmal successfully for only so long, he has the smile on now, cleaning Hussey up with a really quick faster one fired in on a length, Ajmal does a furious jig
Ajmal to Wade, no run
Ajmal to Wade, no run cuts from off stump, backward point dives and stops the ball, throws it to the keeper, Wade has to dive back in now
Ajmal to Wade, 1 run opens the face as he shuffles across and runs it behind point
Umar Gul to Wade, 2 runs full one sliced hard over covers for a couple as sweeper gets to it
Umar Gul to Wade, 2 runs slices again, off a thick edge down to third man, Wade charges up for the second
Umar Gul to Wade, 1 run low full toss hit down to long on
Umar Gul to Christian, 2 runs moving in a bit full, mishit to midwicket, it still fetches them two
Umar Gul to Christian, OUT slow bouncer, and Gul has one more, Christian had a belated go at it, ended up thick-edging it to the keeper
Umar Gul to Cummins, 1 run high full toss shovelled past extra cover for a single

Australia made 57 for 6 in 9.2 overs after the opening partnership was broken. Remarkable hitting from Warner and Watson, and remarkable fightback from Pakistan. Ajmal tormenting Australia till the very end of this tour then
Watson to start off, slip in place
Pakistan will need their highest successful chase in a T20I to win this one. Their best is 165 in the World T20 2007, against Australia
Watson to Hafeez, 2 runs walks down the pitch to a length ball and squeezes it behind point, decides to come back for the second and makes it in time
Watson to Hafeez, no run beaten, he likes to punch off the back foot, this one leaves him from a length
Watson to Hafeez, 3 runs full and swinging in, flicked away, in the air, past midwicket, who runs after it and pulls it back just inside the rope
Watson to Imran Nazir, no run quietly works a length ball from off to midwicket
Watson to Imran Nazir, no run holds its line now as it bounces from a good length outside off, pushed to covers
Watson to Imran Nazir, 1 run hit on the thigh pad as he fails to work a back of a length ball to leg, they take the single as the ball rolls to the off side
Starc to Imran Nazir, no run straightens after being angled across outside off, good length, slapped away from the crease, Warner gets behind it to his right at point
Starc to Imran Nazir, 1 wide swings in from a fuller length, and carries down leg

Starc to Imran Nazir, OUT that has to be very close, and Nazir has to go back, straightening right on the stumps, Nazir hit on the pad on the forward push, looked out on first look, pitched off, swung in, struck him just below the knee roll in front of middle and leg
Starc to Jamshed, no run pushes with the away swing from him, to covers
Starc to Jamshed, FOUR runs goes reaching out for a wide one, and thick-edges it past slip
Starc to Jamshed, no run ducks under a bouncer angled into the left-hander
Starc to Jamshed, no run pitched up, he looks to be in good nick as he eases it calmly to wide mid off
Cummins to Hafeez, FOUR runs stroked over mid off, straightening around off stump, Hafeez checked his push a bit as he reached out, but timed it quite well in the end, comfortably over mid off
Cummins to Malik, no run left alone as it swings in outside off
Cummins to Malik, no run driven crisply but Warner is too quick at point to cut it off
Cummins to Kamran, no run swings in full again, Kamran goes forward and thumps it hard, but short extra cover saves the boundary with a dive
Starc to Jamshed, 1 run back of a length, worked to midwicket
Starc to Kamran, no run stays in the crease and punches a back of a length ball to point
Starc to Kamran, no run punched wide of extra cover
Starc to Jamshed, no run beaten, back of a length ball moving away outside off, reaches weakly at it
Starc to Jamshed, no run and again, this time he tries to push away from the body, the ball leaves him
Cummins to Umar Akmal, 1 run pushes at a length ball angled in, gets it away to third man
Cummins to Jamshed, 1 run right on off, angled across, he pushes softly in front of mid off
Cummins to Umar Akmal, no run holding its line after being angled in outside off, he pushes at it, in the air for a while, to point
Cummins to Umar Akmal, no run from wide of the crease, holds its line again outside off, this is such a difficult angle to play, pushed to cover
Cummins to Umar Akmal, no run pitched up closer to off now, a crisp drive straight to mid off
Cummins to Umar Akmal, 1 run angled into the pads this time, worked to deep midwicket

Watson to Umar Akmal, OUT excellent judge of a catch Michael Hussey is, and he shows it again, that was a pretty decent stroke, Umar Akmal walked out and created momentum for the flick over midwicket, Hussey was far away from the ball as he sprinted across from deep midwicket to his left, to
Watson to Jamshed, 1 run whipped off the pads to deep square
Watson to Abdul Razzaq, no run punched to extra cover off the back foot
Watson to Abdul Razzaq, 1 run cut to cover, throw misses at the striker's, direct hit would have been close, but the throw was pretty wide
Watson to Jamshed, no run slower one angled across outside off, beats the outside edge

Watson to Jamshed, no run goes for the pull to one down the leg side, misses, the caught behind appeal is turned down, and it is not called a wide either, hmm, have to see replays, Watson unfortunate not to get that one, replays show it came off the glove, there was a deflection too
Hogg to Abdul Razzaq, no run comes in from outside off, steered to short third, can
Hogg to Abdul Razzaq, 2 wide down the leg side, rolls behind square leg
Hogg to Jamshed, no run slides in to the left-hander with the angle, hits thigh pad and rolls away
Hogg to Jamshed, 1 run turns away sharply, slapped to extra cover, direct hit at the non-striker's gets them one off the ricochet
Hogg to Abdul Razzaq, 1 run flighted full driven to long off
Hogg to Jamshed, no run goes forward to defend a dipping tossed ball to covers
Hogg to Jamshed, 1 run flat and spinning away, cut past point, sweeper gets across
Maxwell to Jamshed, no run drives a full delivery to extra cover
Maxwell to Jamshed, no run pushes a length ball down the pitch
Maxwell to Jamshed, no run drives a full one back to the bowler
Maxwell to Jamshed, 1 run floated down the leg side, off the keeper's pads, could have taken a thin edge, not sure
Maxwell to Abdul Razzaq, no run quick offbreak on middle, blocked
Maxwell to Abdul Razzaq, 2 runs thick edge runs to the third man rope, pulled back in time
Hogg to Jamshed, FOUR runs enough flight for him to size up the slog sweep, go down on a knee and mow it flat over midwicket
Hogg to Jamshed, 1 run low tossed up full toss, nudged to fine leg
Hogg to Abdul Razzaq, no run beaten, quicker through the air, angled across from back of the hand, and spins away from the right-hander
Hogg to Abdul Razzaq, no run beaten in the flight, checks his stroke, on the bounce to midwicket
Hogg to Abdul Razzaq, no run not picking it, rocks back, makes room, the ball spins away again outside off, cannot reach it
Hogg to Abdul Razzaq, no run
Maxwell to Jamshed, 2 runs worked off the pad and past short fine's dive

Maxwell to Jamshed, OUT hello, that is one of the softest dismissals you'll see, Jamshed pushing tamely off the back foot straight to extra cover, gentle offspinner from round the stumps, on a length, bounces a bit more, he pushes away from the body, and extra cover jogs in to take the gift
Maxwell to Arafat, 1 run flicked through midwicket
Maxwell to Abdul Razzaq, no run down the leg side
Maxwell to Abdul Razzaq, 1 wide down the leg side
Maxwell to Abdul Razzaq, no run runs it to short third man again
Maxwell to Abdul Razzaq, no run full one patted back to the bowler
Hogg to Arafat, no run spins ins sharply from around off, worked to midwicket

Hogg to Arafat, no run the wrong 'un, leading edge falls short of point, tossed up, from back of the had, turns away from the right hander on middle and off, he was looking to work it to leg, they are not picking him at all
Hogg to Arafat, no run spins in now, hits him on the pad, was going down leg
Hogg to Arafat, no run worked square to leg
Hogg to Arafat, no run and again, wants to drive through extra cover, it carries across with the angle, does not turn in, beaten
Hogg to Arafat, no run beaten on the cut this time, Hogg could play for a few more years surely, terrific control
Christian to Abdul Razzaq, 1 run plays from the crease, surprised as the length ball seems to stop a bit, stabbed down towards long on
Christian to Arafat, no run slow length ball punched to point
Christian to Arafat, no run has a swing and misses a length ball which goes quite close to off
Christian to Arafat, no run moves forward but ends up pushing it back to the bowler
Christian to Arafat, SIX runs got hold of this one alright, mowed over midwicket from well outside off, seemed to bounce just in front of the rope, just
Christian to Arafat, 1 run charges out and slaps a length ball in the air to sweeper cover
Starc to Arafat, 3 runs pitched up, angled in, driven hard past extra cover's dive, sweeper goes screaming across the turf with his slide, and prevents the four
Starc to Abdul Razzaq, no run full toss hit straight to extra cover
Starc to Abdul Razzaq, no run plays one angled in sharply from deep in the crease, pushes it towards extra cover
Starc to Abdul Razzaq, no run pitched up, defended to extra cover again
Starc to Abdul Razzaq, 1 run very full, he drives down to long off
Starc to Arafat, 1 run full ball again, he scythes it to wide long off
Watson to Arafat, no run tries to drag this one from outside off, it is the slower one, and he is beaten
Watson to Arafat, 1 run comes out and works a length ball to wide long on
Watson to Abdul Razzaq, 1 run slower one again, full and on the stumps, he adjusts to squeeze it down to long off
Watson to Arafat, 1 run another slower one, whipped to long on
Watson to Abdul Razzaq, 1 run makes some room and guides it behind point, but backward point runs across and dives to take pace off it
Watson to Arafat, 1 run drives a full toss to sweeper cover, who keeps them to one
Hogg to Umar Gul, no run appeal for leg before, as he rips this one in to the right-hander, headed down leg probably
Hogg to Umar Gul, no run
Hogg to Umar Gul, 1 run swept to deep square leg from outside off
Hogg to Abdul Razzaq, no run what a ripper, that has kicked across the right-hander from a good length, Razzaq manages a weak smile
Hogg to Abdul Razzaq, no run could not pick him last ball of his spell as well, tried a big heave, ended up swinging way inside the line, as it angled away
Maxwell to Umar Gul, no run forced straight to midwicket
Maxwell to Umar Gul, 1 run carts it away to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Abdul Razzaq, 1 run down the track, and crashes it down the ground, Australia are in no mood to give any boundaries, long off dives and saves it
Maxwell to Umar Gul, 1 run long off in business again as Gul hits down the ground now
Maxwell to Ajmal, no run works an offspinner to short fine leg
Cummins to Abdul Razzaq, FOUR runs slow, full and wide, carted high over extra cover with feet wide apart
Cummins to Abdul Razzaq, no run mstimes the heave to midwicket

Cummins to Abdul Razzaq, OUT the slow bouncer earns Cummins another wicket, a similar delivery had been put away over point by the same batsman in the previous game in the Super Over, this time Razzaq slashes it on his toes, and short third man scrambles to his right to take it
Cummins to Raza Hasan, no run pacy length ball played out to point
Cummins to Raza Hasan, no run avoids a bouncer as he crouches under it
Cummins to Raza Hasan, no run full and angled in, pushed to midwicket
Maxwell to Ajmal, no run worked wristily from outside off to midwicket
Maxwell to Ajmal, no run swept from outside off again, to short fine
Maxwell to Ajmal, 1 run charges out and heaves through square leg
Maxwell to Raza Hasan, 4 byes everyone missed, batsman, ball, keeper, Raza pushed well outside the line of the offbreak, which bounced just over the stumps, and Wade could not gather
Maxwell to Raza Hasan, no run pushed to the bowler
Maxwell to Raza Hasan, 1 run punched off the back foot to long off
Cummins to Raza Hasan, no run moves across, right behind the line of a length ball and blocks, pretty decent technique
Cummins to Raza Hasan, no run lets a wide and full go outside off
Cummins to Raza Hasan, FOUR runs thick edge as he prods at a widish one that moves in, does not carry to White at wide slip
Cummins to Raza Hasan, no run right forward and smothers a pitched up ball to the off side
Cummins to Raza Hasan, no run full, slow and wide, pushed on the bounce to extra cover
Cummins to Raza Hasan, no run again he is behind the line of a length ball angled in, and defends solidly, end of Cummins' excellent spell, he's come back strongly after that Super Over

Pakistan make their lowest T20I total, equalling the lowest-ever by a Test nation, suffer their heaviest T20I defeat in terms of runs, and take the series. Warner & Watson, Starc & Cummins proving too much for Pakistan despite the late fightback with the ball. W&W putting on 111 for the first wick
Hafeez accepts the series trophy, Umar Akmal wants it immediately, he gets it now, and Pakistan sit down to pose for the cameras.
That is it from us for the moment for this series. Abhishek Purohit signing off. Cheers
Australia won by 94 runs
Player of the match is David Warner, AUS
